alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 11:54PM CDT until July 09 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Southeastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1153 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Knowles to 7 miles south of Guymon, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Perryton, Spearman, Lipscomb, Booker, Gruver, Follett, Higgins, Darrouzett, Hardesty, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Farnsworth, Boyd, Waka, Bryans Corner, Slapout and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
